entry.title: Community Market Village Rules!
entry.text: - Main purpose for market village is to provide people with opportunity to build their own custom stores. You can have a personal store, you can team up with other people and build a group store. - To claim market spot just place a single LCB in the center of the plot of your choice. To help you there will be a red block marking center. - You are allowed to claim only 1 of the Market spots. - NO Skyscrapers no need for silly mega bases. Max allowed height is 15-20 blocks above road level. - NO TREE FARMS, few trees just for decoration are allowed. NO SNOW TREES are allowed. - Digging down is fine, just stay within your LCB, no digging under the roads or walls. - There are no limit on vending machines you can have on your claim at market. - If having your own Market is not for you, we have a few spots available at the main building, you can have 1 or the other, not both. - If we find you placed your LCB in the wrong position, or ignore the very few rules we have set, your stuff could get removed without warning.
